english.segment1: My eyes roll back into my head, i'm trying to keep my head on straight to. understand. Remember what he said, "Yes, I do believe". A smile reached the surface.
english.segment2: Free me. You have freed me, I will not suffer anymore, Suffer anymore. I'm alive.
english.segment3: I'm scared stiff, i'm shakin' in my boots. When you come face to face with the reason. you exsist. I'm holdin' on to truth, and livin' like a king. I'm tired now, somehow I will survive. I can't remember. how it feels to be alright.
english.segment4: By grace, you have freed me, I will not. suffer anymore, I will not suffer anymore, suffer anymore. I'm alive.
